metadata.name: Saam Nariman
metadata.description:
Saam is the son of Nariman, the father of Zaal and the grandfather of Rostam, a descendant of Garshasp, a mythical hero. Saam is the leader of the Zabolians after Nariman. He is a famous hero in the time of Manouchehr. Manouchehr All members are present when sitting on the bed, but only Saam is the one who is trusted by Manouchehr more than others.
Saam is one of the bravest men and the most powerful mythical heroes
He shouts with great power, and great intelligence, to face the enemies, and to help the weak, with his heavy mace, ready, and with anger at every enemy ...
